scripts.build: rm -rf lib; babel src -d lib --copy-files && npm run build-gui
scripts.build-gui: NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./lib/lib browserify -v --poll -t [ babelify ] -p [ css-modulesify --after autoprefixer -o lib/bot/dashboard/public/css/bundle.css ] -g uglifyify lib/bot/dashboard/react/index.js -o lib/bot/dashboard/public/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: NODE_PATH=./src/lib watchify -v --poll -t [ babelify ] -p [ css-modulesify --after autoprefixer -o src/bot/dashboard/public/css/bundle.css ] -g uglifyify src/bot/dashboard/react/index.js -o src/bot/dashboard/public/js/bundle.js
